testcase.system-out: Given user is on the contact landing page...................................passed And user accepts cookies....................................................passed And user checks for the headers presence....................................passed Then user clicks on the the get started before signing in link..............passed Then user is taken to choose products page..................................passed

testcase.name: Check the Quick links
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the contact landing page...................................passed And user accepts cookies....................................................passed And user checks for the headers presence....................................passed Then Quick link section is visible irrespective of user state...............passed
